SELECT BOOK_NO AS no, BOOK_IMAGE_COVER AS image, BOOK_NAME AS bookName, AUTHOR_NAME AS authorName, BOOK_LIST_PRICE AS price, BOOK_DISCOUNT_RATE AS discountRate, BOOK_STOCK AS stock, BOOK_DISCONTINUING_YN AS discontinuingYn, BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE AS publishedDate
FROM (SELECT B.BOOK_NO, BI.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER, B.BOOK_NAME, A.AUTHOR_NAME, B.BOOK_LIST_PRICE, B.BOOK_DISCOUNT_RATE, B.BOOK_STOCK, B.BOOK_DISCONTINUING_YN, B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE,
row_number() OVER(ORDER BY BOOK_NAME ASC) AS row_num
row_number() OVER(ORDER BY BOOK_LIST_PRICE DESC) AS row_num
row_number() OVER(ORDER BY BOOK_LIST_PRICE ASC) AS row_num
row_number() OVER(ORDER BY BOOK_STOCK DESC) AS row_num
row_number() OVER(ORDER BY BOOK_STOCK ASC) AS row_num
row_number() OVER(ORDER BY BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE DESC) AS row_num
FROM BookHub.BOOK B INNER JOIN BOOK_AUTHOR BA ON B.BOOK_NO = BA.BOOK_NO INNER JOIN AUTHOR A ON BA.AUTHOR_NO = A.AUTHOR_NO INNER JOIN PUBLISHER P ON B.PUBLISHER_NO = P.PUBLISHER_NO INNER JOIN BOOK_IMAGES BI ON B.BOOK_NO = BI.BOOK_NO
B.BOOK_NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
A.AUTHOR_NAME = #{keyword}
P.PUBLISHER_NAME = #{keyword}
) AS subQuery
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
